verses.kjv: Beloved, believe not every spirit, but try the spirits whether they are of God: because many false prophets are gone out into the world.
verses.ct: Dear friends, don't trust every spirit. Instead, test the spirits to see if they come from God, because many false prophets have gone out into the world.

verses.kjv: Hereby know ye the Spirit of God: Every spirit that confesseth that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is of God:
verses.ct: Here is how you can recognize the Spirit of God: every spirit that acknowledges that Jesus Christ came in a physical body is from God.

verses.kjv: And every spirit that confesseth not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is not of God: and this is that spirit of antichrist, whereof ye have heard that it should come; and even now already is it in the world.
verses.ct: But any spirit that does not acknowledge that Jesus Christ came in a physical body is not from God. This is the spirit of the antichrist, which you heard was coming — and it is already in the world right now.

verses.kjv: Ye are of God, little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.
verses.ct: You belong to God, dear children, and you have defeated them, because the one who is in you is greater than the one who is in the world.

verses.kjv: They are of the world: therefore speak they of the world, and the world heareth them.
verses.ct: They belong to the world, so they speak from the world's perspective, and the world listens to them.

verses.kjv: We are of God: he that knoweth God heareth us; he that is not of God heareth not us. Hereby know we the spirit of truth, and the spirit of error.
verses.ct: We belong to God. Anyone who knows God listens to us; anyone who doesn't belong to God won't listen to us. This is how we distinguish the spirit of truth from the spirit of deception.

verses.kjv: Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God.
verses.ct: Dear friends, let's love each other, because love comes from God. Everyone who loves has been born of God and knows God.

verses.kjv: He that loveth not knoweth not God; for God is love.
verses.ct: Whoever does not love does not know God, because God is love.

verses.kjv: In this was manifested the love of God toward us, because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him.
verses.ct: God showed his love for us by sending his one and only Son into the world so that we could have life through him.

verses.kjv: Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins.
verses.ct: This is what real love looks like — not that we loved God, but that he loved us and sent his Son as the atoning sacrifice for our sins.

verses.kjv: Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.
verses.ct: Dear friends, since God loved us this much, we should also love each other.

verses.kjv: No man hath seen God at any time. If we love one another, God dwelleth in us, and his love is perfected in us.
verses.ct: No one has ever seen God. But if we love each other, God lives in us, and his love reaches its full expression in us.

verses.kjv: Hereby know we that we dwell in him, and he in us, because he hath given us of his Spirit.
verses.ct: This is how we know that we remain in him and he remains in us: he has given us his Spirit.

verses.kjv: And we have seen and do testify that the Father sent the Son to be the Saviour of the world.
verses.ct: We have witnessed and can confirm that the Father sent the Son to be the Savior of the world.

verses.kjv: Whosoever shall confess that Jesus is the Son of God, God dwelleth in him, and he in God.
verses.ct: Whoever declares that Jesus is the Son of God — God lives in that person, and that person lives in God.

verses.kjv: And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us. God is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him.
verses.ct: We have come to know and trust the love that God has for us. God is love, and whoever lives in love lives in God, and God lives in them.

verses.kjv: Herein is our love made perfect, that we may have boldness in the day of judgment: because as he is, so are we in this world.
verses.ct: This is how love reaches its full expression among us: so that we can stand with confidence on the day of judgment, because as he is, so are we in this world.

verses.kjv: There is no fear in love; but perfect love casteth out fear: because fear hath torment. He that feareth is not made perfect in love.
verses.ct: There is no fear in love. Instead, fully developed love drives out fear, because fear involves punishment. The person who is afraid has not yet been brought to maturity in love.

verses.kjv: We love him, because he first loved us.
verses.ct: We love because he loved us first.

verses.kjv: If a man say, I love God, and hateth his brother, he is a liar: for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen, how can he love God whom he hath not seen?
verses.ct: If someone claims, 'I love God,' but hates a fellow believer, that person is a liar. After all, if you can't love a brother or sister you can actually see, how could you possibly love God, whom you cannot see?

verses.kjv: And this commandment have we from him, That he who loveth God love his brother also.
verses.ct: This is the command we have received from him: whoever loves God must also love their brother and sister.
